question: Which of the following states in India has BS-VI fuel currently?
explanation: The Centre told the Supreme Court that the BS-VI fuel will be made available by April 1, 2019, in 17 out of 23 districts in the National Capital Region. The government also told that BS-VI fuel will also be made available in Agra in Uttar Pradesh on or before April 1, 2019. Delhi has already switched to BS-VI fuel and the cleaner fuel is now available across the petrol pumps in Delhi.
